Name: Amrish
Heading: Dharmashtra National Law University(DNLU), Madhya Pradesh Review

The campus is constructed in over 120 acres of land and after the construction of Dharmashastra National Law University(DNLU), Madhya Pradesh will become the largest NLU in India. Name: ALEENA JOHNSON

The college also has four clubs namely:- HR, Finance, Marketing, and Operations. The college also hosts an intra collegiate business plan competition - " The First Pitch". Heading: Generous review on college

Name: Jala Prajash
College: IIT Hyderabad - Indian Institute of Technology - [IITH]
Heading: Insides of IIT Hyderabad.
Review:

Name: Abhishek kumar

Of sports activities such as - basketball, athletics, volleyball, table tennis, chess and much more.

Name: Nirmal Singh
College: Bharati Vidyapeeth Institute of Management and Research - [BVIMR]
Heading: Institute for Financial Management and Research never disappoint
Review: My background was in management so I found this choice to be the most valuable, and it is the primary reason I chose this course. It was a standard course that lasted two years. I had words, and throughout per term, we read about various topics linked to the present corporate environment. We received training in design thinking and issue solving during the fourth semester. My last term electives were finance and accounting.

Name: MEHUL BAGARIA
Heading: Marketing Centric B School of North India
Review:
I chose to pursue MBA in marketing to further enhance my skill set and knowledge of business studies after having decent practical exposure of working in my family business and getting hands-on with on-ground work involved in an organization.
The faculties to student ratio are average with around 60 to 65 people in a section and this helps in opening doors for enhanced peer learning and deliberation in classes, especially during case study analysis, the core of any MBA program.
Teachers have extensive industrial and teaching experience and employ the latest pedagogies in their teaching techniques generating a lot of engagement and interaction in each lecture and are very receptive to feedback
Exams are of moderate difficulty with emphasis on application-based questions.

Name: Lily Dey
Heading: Lively and active campus life.
